Package controller

Class Customers

java.lang.Object
controller.Customers
public class Customers extends Object
The Customers controller class for the Customers view. Facilitates processing of customer data, including insertion, updating, and deletion, through interactions with CustomerDAO.

  • Constructor Details

    • Customers

      public Customers()

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize()
      Initializes UI components, populates the TableView, and sets up dynamic population of combo boxes.

    • toggleUIState

      private void toggleUIState()
      Toggles the UI state between default, new customer, and edit customer modes. Enables or disables form fields and buttons based on the current mode.

    • resetCustomerFields

      private void resetCustomerFields()
      Resets all form fields to their initial, empty state.

    • refreshTableView

      private void refreshTableView()
      Refreshes the TableView with the list of customers.

    • populateCountryAndStateProvinceComboBoxes

      private void populateCountryAndStateProvinceComboBoxes()
      Populates the country ComboBox with country names from the database. Also sets up a listener to enable/disable the state/province ComboBox based on the country selection and to populate state/province ComboBox when a country is selected.

      LAMBDA: The lambda here was used as a more compact way to define the desired behavior in response to a listener event.

    • onAppointmentsTabButtonClick

      public void onAppointmentsTabButtonClick(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Switches the current scene to the Appointments view when the Appointments navigation tab is clicked.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - A click event on the Appointments Navigation Tab.

    • onReportsTabButtonClick

      public void onReportsTabButtonClick(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Switches the current scene to the Reports view when the Reports navigation tab is clicked.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - A click event on the Reports Navigation Tab.

    • onEditCustomerButtonClick

      public void onEditCustomerButtonClick(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Responds to the click event for the Edit Customer button. Toggles the UI state between editing an existing customer and the default state. If a customer is selected, it populates the UI fields with the selected customer's details. If no customer is selected, an error alert is shown.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - A click event on the Edit Customer button.

    • onNewCustomerButtonClick

      public void onNewCustomerButtonClick(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Responds to click event for New Customer button. Toggles the UI state between creating a new customer and the default state. Calls a method to update the UI elements based on the new state.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - A click event on the New Customer button.

    • onSaveCustomerButtonClick

      public void onSaveCustomerButtonClick(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Responds to the click event for the Save Customer Button. Depending on current UI state, either creates a new customer or updates an existing customer.

    • onDeleteCustomerButtonClick

      public void onDeleteCustomerButtonClick(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Responds to the click event for the Delete Customer Button. If a customer is selected, it shows a confirmation dialog before proceeding to delete the customer. If no customer is selected, an error alert is shown. The UI is updated upon successful deletion.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - A click event on the Delete Customer button.

    • onLogoutButtonClick

      public void onLogoutButtonClick(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Handles the event for logout button clicks. Logs out the current user by calling the UserLogin.userLogout method.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - A click event on the logout button.

    • checkForEmptyFields

      private void checkForEmptyFields()
      Performs a validation check to ensure that all fields have been filled out in the customer form. If any fields are empty, an alert dialog is shown and the user is asked to complete the form before trying again.

    • createNewCustomer

      private void createNewCustomer()
      Gets data from the form fields and creates a new customer object. The new customer object is used in conjunction with DAO methods to insert a new customer into the database. Upon success, the UI is refreshed to show the updated list of customers. If insertion fails, an alert and UI message is displayed.

    • updateExistingCustomer

      private void updateExistingCustomer()
      Updates an existing customer record. Gets the customer from the table, updates their data with the form field values, and applies these changes to the database using DAO methods. Refreshes the UI and displays a message indicating whether the update was successful or failed, with an added alert dialog on failure.

    • convertToUTC

      private LocalDateTime convertToUTC(LocalDateTime localDateTime)
      Converts a given LocalDateTime to its UTC equivalent.
      Parameters:
      localDateTime - The local date-time to convert.
      Returns:
      The UTC equivalent of the given local datetime.
